text: June Angela (born June Angela Profanato, August 1959) is an American actress, tap dancer and singer. She was 10 years old in season 1 (1969-1970) of Sesame Street (where she cameo appeared) and 12-17 and 49 years old in seasons 1-7 (1971-1977, 2006 and 2009) of The Electric Company. ==Filmography== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American dancers Category:Singers from New York City Category:Actors from New York City Category:American television actors
title: June Angela
